name: VR Police Training Experience
description: A VR experience to train officers within the Lancashire Constabulary on how conduct investigations and how to interact with digital devices. Focusing on accessibility and intuitiveness, quality code, and a designer friendly approach.

name: (WIP) Unreal Brawler Project
description: A third-person brawler game set in a Norse inspired futuristic world. Created in collaboration with a small team in Unreal Engine 4, with my focus being to develop the AI, animation, and UI systems.

name: 3D Object Manipulation in AR (BSc Project)
description: This forms the basis for my BSc dissertation and subsequent (submitted) research paper. It includes a unique and novel interaction technique for 3D object manipulation in AR on mobile devices.

name: Portfolio Website
description: This website. An experiment into developing a website from scratch without using any web frameworks. Supporting the dynamic creation and population of project cards and descriptions using JSON files.

name: Unreal Engine 4 & C++ Course
description: This is a showcase of some of the games I developed and techniques learned as part of the Unreal Engine C++ Developer course.

name: Unity RPG Combat Creator Course
description: This is a showcase of some of the game I developed and techniques learned as part of the Unity RPG Core Combat Creator course.
